allow: Bash(# Check where tmux config is and what terminal-overrides it has grep -n ""terminal"" ~/.tmux.conf)

Bash(# Comprehensive diagnostics echo ""=== TERM outside/inside tmux ==="" echo ""Current TERM: $TERM"" echo ""COLORTERM: $COLORTERM"" echo """" echo ""=== tmux version ==="" tmux -V echo """" echo ""=== tmux terminal settings ==="" tmux display -p ""default-terminal: #{default-terminal}"" tmux show -s terminal-overrides tmux show -s terminal-features || echo ""terminal-features not available"" echo """" echo ""=== Check if Tc capability is recognized ==="" tmux info)
Bash(# Find the generated init.lua find /nix/store -maxdepth 2 -name ""init.lua"" -path ""*neovim*"")
